meanings.definition: Not having official approval or recognition.
meanings.sent1: The noncertified document was not accepted by the authorities.
meanings.sent2: The noncertified product did not meet safety regulations.
meanings.sent3: The noncertified badge caused quite a stir at the event.
meanings.sent4: Her noncertified status made her feel like an outsider in the group.
meanings.sent5: The noncertified label on the package raised concerns about its quality.

meanings.definition: Not meeting the necessary qualifications or standards.
meanings.sent1: His noncertified skills were not sufficient for the job.
meanings.sent2: The noncertified candidate failed to impress the interviewers.
meanings.sent3: The noncertified attempt at baking a cake turned into a disaster.
meanings.sent4: The noncertified performance fell short of expectations.
meanings.sent5: Her noncertified knowledge of the subject was evident in her answers.

meanings.definition: Not possessing a certification or license.
meanings.sent1: The noncertified driver was not allowed to operate the vehicle.
meanings.sent2: The noncertified plumber could not guarantee the quality of work.
meanings.sent3: The noncertified explorer set off on a wild adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her noncertified membership did not grant her access to the exclusive club.
meanings.sent5: The noncertified contractor faced legal issues due to lack of proper documentation.
